successes.title: TOKAIDO - COLLECTOR'S EDITION
successes.description: Discover the Collector's Edition of TOKAIDO: the acclaimed singular gaming experience by Antoine Bauza.

Pledges.description:
Collector's Accessories Pack - ONLY MAKES SENSE IF YOU ALREADY OWN A COPY OF TOKAIDO + CROSSROADS.
You get the 16 Supercute Minis + the 5 scoring tokens + the 50 metal coins + the purse for the coins + the new Crossroads die + the CD soundtrack.
*stretch goals do not apply to this pledge level.- Please see the “Shipping” section for shipping fees.

YAKUZA – earlybird round 1 level - Be one of the first to support us and get an exceptional price for the Collector’s Edition ($90 estimated retail price) + most of the stretch goals (except the ones with the samurai logo). - Please see the “Shipping” section for shipping fees.

YAKUZA – earlybird round 2 level - Be one of the first to support us and get an exceptional price for the Collector’s Edition ($90 estimated retail price) + most of the stretch goals (except the ones with the samurai logo). - Please see the “Shipping” section for shipping fees.

PILGRIM level - 1 TOKAIDO Collector’s Edition at a special price ($90 estimated retail price) + most of the stretch goals (except the ones with the samurai logo). - Please see the “Shipping” section for shipping fees.

RONIN level - 1 TOKAIDO Collector’s Edition at a special price ($90 estimated retail price).
+ 1 bonus character tile: “Eriku” 
+ 4 bonus cards: “The new encounters”
+ most of the stretch goals (except the ones with the samurai logo).- Please see the “Shipping” section for shipping fees.

ARTIST level - 1 TOKAIDO Collector’s Edition + 1 bonus character tile: “Eriku” + 4 bonus cards: “The new encounters” + 1 digital book: “The Art of Tokaido” + most of the stretch goals (except the ones with the samurai logo).- Please see the “Shipping” section for shipping fees.

FRANCAIS level - 1 boite de TOKAIDO édition Collector en français ! Amis Français et francophones, cette édition en tirage limité vous est proposée en avant-première avec ses goodies ! + 1 tuile de personnage bonus « Eriku » + 4 cartes bonus « les nouvelles rencontres » en français. + 1 livre digital « The Art of Tokaido » en français + la plupart des stretch goals (sauf ceux avec le logo samouraï). - voir la section "Shipping" pour les frais de ports.

SAMURAI - early bird level - 1 TOKAIDO Collector’s Edition + 1 bonus character tile: “Eriku” + 4 bonus cards: “The new encounters” + 1 digital book: “The Art of Tokaido” + ALL UNLOCKED STRETCHGOALS FOR FREE! (including the ones with the samurai logo).- Please see the “Shipping” section for shipping fees.

SAMURAI level - 1 TOKAIDO Collector’s Edition + 1 bonus character tile: “Eriku” + 4 bonus cards: “The new encounters” + 1 digital book: “The Art of Tokaido” + ALL UNLOCKED STRETCHGOALS FOR FREE! (including the ones with the samurai logo).- Please see the “Shipping” section for shipping fees.

SAMURAI FRANCAIS level - 1 boite de TOKAIDO édition Collector en français ! Amis Français et francophones, cette édition en tirage limité vous est proposée en avant-première avec ses goodies ! + 1 tuile de personnage bonus « Eriku » + 4 cartes bonus « les nouvelles rencontres » en français. + 1 livre digital « The Art of Tokaido » en français + TOUS les stretch goals (incluant ceux avec le logo samouraï). - voir la section "Shipping" pour les frais de ports.

SHOGUN level - 1 TOKAIDO Collector’s Edition
+ 1 bonus character tile: “Eriku” 
+ 4 bonus cards: “The new encounters”
+ 1 digital book: “The Art of Tokaido”
+ All Unlocked Stretch Goals for free! (including the ones with the samurai logo).
+ Become one of the characters in TOKAIDO: Naïade will illustrate one character tile of the Collector’s Edition, inspired by you or whomever you want! This would make a really special gift!
+ A lithography of your character signed by Naïade and Antoine Bauza.- Please see the “Shipping” section for shipping fees.
